Clarissa Côrtes Pires

  • Endereço para acessar este CV: http://lattes.cnpq.br/7618444120818695
  • Última atualização do currículo em 25/05/2015

R&D and Innovation Specialist Career developed in Engineering and IT services companies, where she held the position of R&D Manager, responsible for defining the processes to foster innovation inside the organization. Doctor of Sciences from ITA researching Innovation for KIBS (Knowledge Intensive Business Services). Master of Science from ITA (2007). PMI, Scrum Master and Scrum Product Owner. Research Interests: Innovation in KIBS; People Management (corporate entrepreneurship, motivation and creativity); and Culture of Innovation. (Texto informado pelo autor)
